column6: THE WINTER SOLDIER HELD PRISONER BY THE RED SKULL! Will the Red Skull kill both Cap and Bucky?  It's anyone's guess, as the second arc of the epic "DEATH OF CAPTAIN AMERICA" storyline opens with a bang!
